body_html:
thanks, @andrewginns for your answer.
the problem with me in the suggestion code to freeze the model is (importing meta graph), that causes me this error:
KeyError: "The name 'Adam' refers to an Operation not in the graph."

this is the reason why I used the trained model directly after the training phase to create a protobuf file, instead of saving the model as a meta file and from that creating a protobuf pb.
body_text:
thanks, @andrewginns for your answer.
the problem with me in the suggestion code to freeze the model is (importing meta graph), that causes me this error:
KeyError: "The name 'Adam' refers to an Operation not in the graph."
this is the reason why I used the trained model directly after the training phase to create a protobuf file, instead of saving the model as a meta file and from that creating a protobuf pb.
body:
thanks, @andrewginns for your answer. 
the problem with me in the suggestion code to freeze the model is (importing meta graph), that causes me this error:
KeyError: "The name 'Adam' refers to an Operation not in the graph."

this is the reason why I used the trained model directly after the training phase to create a protobuf file, instead of saving the model as a meta file and from that creating a protobuf pb.
